availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Allen County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy Colbert Kennedy in Barren County, Kentucky, on August 10, 1833. Father of M. J. Kennedy, Nancy Kennedy, Elizabeth Kennedy, J. M. Kennedy, W. F. Kennedy, D. W. Kennedy, W. A. Kennedy, and M. A. Kennedy. Farmer in Allen County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Allen County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Allen County, p. 129B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Allen County, Puncheon, p. 307-8.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Barren County Marriages, Film 000209752.
